GSP33yaatsi_u:711: ata eva mamedaṃ gṛhamitivāt mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedapratibhāso vyavahāraśca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:712: na hyasau sākṣātpratītabhedanimittaḥ pratāyamānaḥ śilāputrakaśīravyapadeśavadaupacāriko yukta āśriyituṃ mamātmetivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:715: ato dehavyatirekiṇaḥ cetanasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāccatsaṃbandhini lākṣaṇiko dehe 'haṃśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:716: bāhyaviṣayeṣu parasparaviruddharūpaparimāṇasaṅkhayāsanniveśagrahaṇena vyatirekasya sphaṭatvāt ātmani tādṛśarūpāntarāgrahaṇena dehābhedapratibhāsabhramo 'vivekinām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:721: praṇihitamanasastu jñātṛtayā siddhyantamahamākāramarthamanavayavamidamiti parisphurataḥ sthūlādavayavinaḥ śarīrāt pṛthagaparokṣayantyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:722: bhavanti ca - jānāmīti pratyayaḥ śarīraviṣayo na bhavati ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:741: idantvena grahaṇameva hastagehāderiva dehasyātmabhedagrahalakṣaṇaṃ tasyātmatve bādhakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:745: svānyagocaraścedaṃpratyayaḥ ekasya puṃsa ekasminnevārthe na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:754: ayaṃbhāvaḥ - ahamiti svasmai bhāsamānaḥ pratyagarthaḥ svātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:755: svasmā idantvenaṃ bhāsamānaśca parāgarthaḥ para iti svaparavibhāgo hi ahamidaṃbuddhiśabdābhyāmeva nirūpyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:758: pratyaktvenāhamiti bhāsamānasyaiva svātmanoḥ daṇḍitvenedamiti bhānaṃ syāddaṇḍyayamitītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:778: trasareṇorniravayavatvānna tadgrūhaṇe niruktaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:785: avayavipratyakṣatvavyāpakatvasyāvayavabhāne svīkāre bādhakopalambho hi bāhyatatpratyakṣamātraviṣayakatayā niyamasaṅkoce mānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:787: nanu manasā kevalamavayavi gṛhyate vināvayavamityata eva niyamaḥ saṅkocanīya iti cettatrāha 'antakaraṇasye'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:788: advārīkṛtabahirindriyasya manasaḥ kevale 'vayavaviśeṣṭa vā śarīrādau bāhyārthe grahaṇapravṛtterasaṃbhavāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:790: ato na manasā śarīrasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭeta kevalena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:791: caitanyavattvena tasyābāhyatvānmanasā grahaṇaṃ bavedvināvayaveneti tu na kalpanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:794: rūpādimadavayavipratyakṣasya tadavayavagocaratvamiti niyame naiva doṣaḥ nīrūpatvādvāyoḥ sparśavattvamātreṇa tasya spārśanopagame 'pīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:803: sthūlo 'haṃ jānāmītyahaṃpratyayo dehadvārā sthaulyānvitāntarātmagocara eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:808: apṛthaksiddhaprakāravācināṃ ca niṣkarṣakabhinnānāṃ śabdānāṃ dharmiṇi mukhyavṛtterupagamāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:811: mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedavyapadeśasya śilāputrakasya śarīramitivadaupacārikatvamastvityāśaṅkāṃ vyudasyati 'na hyasā'viti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:822: ahaṃ gacchāmītyādāvahaṃśabda ātmavati dehe lākṣaṇika iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:823: dehātmabhramavatāṃ tu śaktibhramamūlastathā prayoga iti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:824: evaṃ tarkabalādahaṃ jānāmīti mānasapratyakṣasya sāvayavadehavyatiriktātmaparatvaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:825: evaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano bhāne sati kathaṃ dehābhedabhrama udetītyatrāha 'bāhye'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:837: bādhakasya bhedakakāragrahasyābhāvamupapādya aikyabhrame sādhakaṃ sādṛśyajñānaṃ copapādayati itaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:839: abhyūha ti iti upasargādasyatyūhyorveti vācya siti vārtikeṇa vaikalpikaṃ parasmaipadam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:852: avahitamanaso niruktaparāmarśavataśca manasā dehavailakṣaṇyenātmanaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:854: evamahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya dehātiriktātmaviṣayatvaṃ tarkabalena vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:855: idameva prayogārūḍhaṃ pradarśayati bhavanti ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:873: saṅghātā hi sarve parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ śayanāsanarathādayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:874: na ca saṅghātāḥ saṃhataśarīrādyarthā dṛśyanta ityātmano 'pi saṃhatatvamāpadyata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:881: na ca saṅghātasya parārthatve parasya saṃhatatvamapi prayojakam ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:884: śarīrapakṣakānātmatvasādhakaprayoge tṛtīyaṃ saṅghātatvarūpaṃ hetumupakṣipati kiṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:898: ātmatvāparārthatvayoḥ parārthatvānātmatvayośca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ śloke pūrvārdhoktaṃ vivṛṇoti sarvasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:906: saṅghātaparasya saṃhatatvadṛṣṭeḥ śarīraparatvenānumitasyā'tmano 'pi saṅghātatvaṃ syādityāśaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati na ca saṅgātā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:908: ātmā saṅghātarūpaṃ saṃhataparatvādityanumāne pratitarko 'tra vivakṣitaḥ ātmā yadi saṅgātaḥ syāttarhiparārthaḥ syāditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:909: ātmā na saṅghātaḥ aparārthatvāditi pratyanumānaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:911: yadvā anumānabalātprasaktamapi saṅghātatvamātmanaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayīkārato nivartsyatītyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:915: yatra pakṣe sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ tatra vahneranuṣṇatvānumāna iva pakṣabhinnatvasyopādhitvasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:916: prakṛte 'pi śarīrātmavādināṃ tadatiriktātmavādināṃ vā saṃhataparārthatvābhāva evopeyate śarīrasyeti tadbhinnatvasyopādhitve na doṣa ityabhimatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:925: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ vyavasthāyāṃ saṃbhavatyāṃ saṃhataparārthatvena tasya vyāpterāśrayaṇamanavasthāprayojakatvānna yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:928: khaṭvādau tathā darśanādityata āha na ca saṅghātasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:929_1: śeṣitvalakṣaṇaṃ paratvaṃ -prādhānyaṃ saṃbhavatīti parārthatvaniyamasya saṅgāta upapatteḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:931: sapakṣe darśanamātreṇa vyāptyanupayogi-sarvagharmoparāgeṇa sādhyasya pakṣe 'numāne 'numānāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaśvetyāha vyāptyanupayogino 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:938: evamahaṃ jānāmītyāderahaṃpratyayasya pratyakṣarūpasya dehātiriktaviṣayatvaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tarkeṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:939: tathā cāhaṃpratyaya eva dehabhedapratyayarūpa itīdaṅkāragocare dehe ātmabhedo 'pi pratyakṣasiddha ityavarṇi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:942: sarva eva kāryadravyagataviśeṣaguṇaḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kathamatatpūrvakaḥ śarīre caitanyaguṇaḥ saṃbhavet? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:943: yattu bārhaspatya vacanam - pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni,
GSP33yaatsi_u:948: sarvadravyeṣu tattatkāryasamadhigabhyaḥ tatpratiyogī śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:955: naca śarīrāvayaveṣu pratyekaṃ caitanyaguṇaḥ prajñāyate pratijñāyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:959: yattu- akāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ citrarūpaṃ paṭe iti ; tanna /
GSP33yaatsi_u:961: sā ca nānārūpaiḥ tantubhiḥ kriyata iti kimanupapannamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:962: pratyekamavidyamānamapi taccitrarūpaṃ tantuṣu saṃhateṣu dṛśyata eva citrā ime tantava iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:968: sa tu rūpaireva kāraṇagatairnānāvidhairārabhyata iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:973: api ca dṛḍha eva śarīre virodhiguṇāpātamantareṇa kusumavilepanagandha iva nivartamānaḥ caitanyasukhādirna tadguṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:977: na ca tathā jñānādiriti nāso tadguṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:978: atha deha ātmabhedasyāpratyakṣatve 'pi tasyānātmatvamacetanatvalakṣaṇamanu- mānāt setsyatītyāha asphuṭatve 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:987: tadguṇāntare tyatra tadruṇa ityatra ca tacchabdena śarīrasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:989: śarīre jñānaguṇasyotpatterayogāccharīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyācca na jñānaṃ śarīraviśeṣaguṇa iti kārikārthaḥ //6//
GSP33yaatsi_u:990: śarīre jñānasyāsaṃbhavaṃ tāvadupapādayati sarva eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:994: bhāve vā ekasminneva dehe 'nekacetanaprasaṅgāt na kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ śarīre caitanyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:999_0: dṛśyatattatkāryeṇānumeyaḥ tatprati- yogī- tattatkāryeṇa nirūpyasvarūpaḥ prayojakatvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:999_1: śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sarvasminnapi dravye tattatkāryapratiniyato 'stīti ca śaktyaḥ sarvabhāvānāmacintyajñānagocarāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1015: vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā vāyau vyabhicāravāraṇāya ekavidhapratyakṣagrāhyajātīyaguṇatvāditi vaktavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1016: guṇatvapraveśe ca kāryatve satīti cintyaprayojanamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1017: viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇe ca jñānādibhinnatvaṃ na dātuṃ śakyaṃ jñānāderviśeṣaguṇatve prāmāṇike satīti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1020: nanu rasaviśeṣo gandhaviśeṣo vā mādako madaśabdavācyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1021: sa ca viśeṣaguṇo na kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kāryadravyaviseṣaguṇasya kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamo durvaca ityatrā'ha dravyādīnā mīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1022: kiṇvādīnāṃ sammardanādināvdyaṇukaparyantanāśe svatantraiḥ paramāṇubhirdravyāntarāvayavasaṃśleṣajanitamadairārabdhe surādravye kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka eva guṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1028: dehāvayaveṣu caitanye sādhakābhāvamuktvā bādhakamapyāha tadupagama iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1031: teṣāmeva cetanatve tu parasparāniyamyatayā parasparavārtānabhijñatayā ca vyavahāravisaṃvādaḥ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1033: yamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmītyādipratisandhānasya tanmūlavyavahārasya ca vilopaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1037: vijātīyarūpeṣu tantuṣu saṃhateṣu citrapratītimāha pratyekam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1044: laukikaviṣayatayā dravyacākṣuṣe sāmānādhikaraṇyena mahattvaviśiṣṭodbhūtarūpasya samavāyena hetutvasaṃbhave hetutāvacchedakakoṭau vyāpyavṛttitvaviśeṣaṇe prayojanābhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1045: tathā ca citrapaṭasya na cākṣuṣatvānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1048: tantugatavividharūpaiḥ paṭe citrarūpārambhavadavayavagatairanudbhūtacaitanyairdehe udbhūtacaitanyārambho 'stviti ca na śaṅkyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1053: jñānasyeva sukhāderapi viśeṣaguṇasya na śarīradharmatvasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1055: atha tadguṇāntaravaidharmyā dityetadvivṛṇoti api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1059: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- agnisaṃyogena rūpaparāvṛttāvapi tadaprasaṅge rūpasya yāvaddravyabhāvitvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1065: svātmamātragrāhyatvaṃ manomātragrāhyatvaṃ ca jñānādeḥ śarīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyamiti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1068: atra prayogaḥ-jñānaṃ na śarīraviśeṣaguṇaḥ ayāvaddravyabhāvitvānmanomātragrāhyatvādvā yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā rūpādīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1069: evaṃ jñānasya śarīradharmatvābhāvasādhanena śarīrasyātmatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1084: tavdyāpāraphalaṃ ca jñānaṃ tadgāmi yuktaṃ snānādhyayanādiphalavat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1094: na hi pañcabhirindriyaiḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ vastvanubhūyate 'nusandhīyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1096: indriyacaitanye ca tattadindriyāpāye tattadindriyārthasmaraṇamapi na bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1099: anyathā ca praṣṭurmṛtyupapattiṃ śaraṇāgataparityāgasya nṛśaṃsatāṃ cā'locya satyatapasastathā vacanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1102: tathā sati hi pūrvoktā doṣāḥ parihṛtā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1111: bāhyendriyeṣu yathāyathaṃ nijaviṣayasannikarṣabhāgiṣvapi yato na yugapadeva sarve viṣayāḥ pratīyante,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1120: tadevaṃ jñānakaraṇatayāvagatasya manasaḥ kathamiva jñāne kartṛtvam ?/
GSP33yaatsi_u:1124: karaṇatvaṃ tu parādhiṣṭhānādhīnavyāpāratārūpapāra tantryaniyataṃ sādhakatamatvamiti kathamivaikatra manasi parasparaviruddha tadubhayadharmasaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyemahi ? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1125: atha tadapi manaḥ karaṇāntareṇa smaraṇādiṣu kartṛbhāvamanubhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1127: ya eva hi cakṣurādibhī rūpādin āntarakaraṇena ca sukhādīṃścetayate, sa evā'tmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1144: yāvadanubhūtasakalaviṣayasusmūrṣayā sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtacetasaḥ sādhāraṇyena praṇidadhayo 'pi na sarva evārthāḥ smṛtimadhirohanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1147: ātmanaḥ ; tathā sati bahirindriyeṣu ca yathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:1148: yathaṃ svaviṣayasaṃprayukteṣu tathaiva yugapajjñānānutpattirupapadyata iti kṛtamindriyāntareṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1156: prayatna eva tvadṛṣṭasyāpīti nātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādīnāmasamavāyikāraṇasāpekṣatayāpi dravyāntaraparikalpanaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1162: iha vā tahri kiṃ na dṛśyate iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptyavagamānantaraṃ sukhādirjāyata iti ?/
GSP33yaatsi_u:1165: ataḥ prasiddhakāraṇabhāveṣveva yatra kāryasamavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1173: sa tarhi sparśavaddravyasamaveto bhautika eva copalabdha iti prasiddhadehādisaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna navama
GSP33yaatsi_u:1190: yathā'mnāyate annamayaṃ hi somya mana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1194: darśitaṃ hi tatraivāṣṭame manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate mano 'sya daivaṃ cakṣuriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1195: tathā parasyāśca devatāyāḥ so 'nyaṃ kāmaṃ manasā dhyāyīteti mahopaniṣadi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1203: ata eva hi buddhimān manasvīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1206: evaṃ ca manasaḥ karaṇatayā vyapadeśo buddhyahaṅkārayoriva vṛttibhedapradarśanaparaḥ pūrveṣāmiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1216: itarathā paramamahato mahataśca sparśavirahiṇaḥ parispandānupapatterutkrāntigatyāgatiśrutayo bhāktāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1224: sa ca kaṇṭhamukhanāsābhyantare bahiśca recitaḥ tvacā spṛśyamāno ghaṭādiriva sphuṭamanātmatayā cakāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1225: atraiva sādhye sādhanāntarāṇi cāha utpattimattvā dityādikārikādvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1234: etadvādhitatvamāha dehe ātmatvaṃ sādhayatāṃ kevalavyatikeriṇām evam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1240: nātra pakṣe prasajyanta ityāha na ca tānī tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1245: yathā snānādhyayanādivyāpāraphalaṃ śaucākṣararāśigrahaṇādi snātradhyetṛsamavetamiti prayogo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1250: indriyātmatve 'numānamuktvā'ptavākyamapi saṃvādarūpaṃ nirdiśati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1255: pratyekendriyacaitanyapakṣe nānāsvāmika iva grāma ekasminneva dehe nānācetanādhiṣṭānānnityakalahādi prasajyate iti dūṣaṇaṃ hṛdi nādhāya dūṣaṇāntaramāha indriyāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1262: tathā hi - saṅghāto yadi saṃyogo bahutvasaṅkhyā vā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1265: tadāpi na bahūnāmindriyāṇāṃ cākṣuṣāśrayatā spārśanāśrayatā vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1268: saṅghātasya tāvataiva vinaṣṭatvānnirātmakatvena dehasya maraṇaprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1275: atha tatsādhakamanumānaṃ dūṣayati na ca tavyadyāpāre ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1279: atha satyatapaso vacanaṃ karaṇe kartṛtvopacāreṇa pravṛttamanyaparaṃ nendriyacaitanye pramāṇamityāha anyathā ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1280: svāśramapraviṣṭavanamṛgānveṣaṇapravṛttavyādhakṛtapraśrottararūpaṃ satyatapaso vacanam draṣṭuścakṣuṣo nāsti jihvā ityādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1281: etasminnarthe śloko 'yamanugṛhīto 'smadgurucaraṇaiḥ yā paśyati na sā brūte sā na paśyati /

GSP33yaatsi_u:2365: dehendriyamanaḥprāṇavijñānebhyo jñānāśrayatayā vivicyamāne pratīpamañcatīva nirbhāsamāno 'haṃbhāva eva hi pratyaktvaṃ nāma /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2368: sarvaṃ ca prakāśamānaṃ jñātre 'hamiti cakāsate prakāśata iti pratyātmasiddho 'yamanubhavaḥ- ahaṃ jānāmi,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2375: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ citāvapi te vāstavamasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2376: yenāgnisaṃparkādayaḥ piṇḍa ivauṣṇyaṃ tatsaṃparkādarthāntare jñātṛtvaṃ jāyeta jñāyeta vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2382: ata eva khalu ahamullekhavigame suṣuptimuktayoḥ svābhāvikaviśadānubhavamātrarūpeṇā'tmanaḥ prakāśaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2388: prakārāntareṇāpi saṃvidaḥ sadharmakatvaṃ sādhayati siddhiśce diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2391: tadanupagame tu śaśaviṣāṇādivadaprakāśamānāyā asiddhyantyāstasyāstucchatvameva prasajyata iti kārikārthaḥ //10//
GSP33yaatsi_u:2397: saviśeṣatvaprasaṅgādbhītaḥ para āha na kasyaci diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2399: prakāśo hi dharmo vinā dharmiṇā na ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2400: siddheḥ sasaṃbandhikatvaṃ vyutpādayati sā hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2406: evaṃ cet sadharmatvamāyātyeva saṃvida ityāha ka iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2407: pitaraṃ prati putrasya putratvamivātmapratiyogikaḥ prakāśo dharmaḥ saṃvidātmanaḥ sidhyatītyarthaḥ / evaṃ kāri
GSP33yaatsi_u:2409: evaṃ saṃvido nirviśeṣatvaṃ nirasya nirviśeṣasaṃvidi vedāntatātparyavarṇanaṃ vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyapraryavasāyītyāha tadevam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2412: kṣaṇikavijñānātmavāde smaraṇādyanupapattyā niraste hi nityavijñānātmavādina utthānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2423: tadevaṃ pratisandhānabalājjñāturevātmatvaṃ na jñānamātrasyeti sthita hṛdi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2434: anyatrānyadharmārope cāropyadharmavatā tathā bhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śaṅkhaḥ pītavān,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2437: na caivamatrānubhūtirahamiti vā ahaṃvatīti vā bhānamasti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2439: ahamarthe saṃvidāropopagamastu na ghaṭate pareṣāṃ satyālambanatvaniyamādāropasya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2443: ahandaṇḍīti pratītitulyatvādahaṃ jānāmīti pratīterahamarthe jñānadharmavattāvagāhitvameveti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2447: yathā daṇḍī puruṣa ityatra daṇḍamātrasya satyatvaṃ puruṣasyāropitatvaṃ ca na,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2448: evamahaṃ jānāmītyatrāpi na jñānamātrasya satstvaṃ jñāturmithyātvaṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2454: nedamadhyastatvasādhakaṃ bādhitatvena sopādhikatvādityāśayamantarnidhāya pratibandīmāha nanvātmataye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2455: dehātmabhramavatāgṛhyamāṇāyā api saṃvido 'bādhyatvānna mithyātvamiti samādhiṃ vācayati pūrvapakṣimukhataḥ tattvajñānodayā diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2456: tulyamidaṃ jñātṛtvasyānadhyastatvaṃ ityāha kiṃ bho riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2458: mokṣe jñātṛtvasya nivṛttāvanarthaṃ prasañjayati hantaivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2459: duḥkhanivṛttyā mukteḥ pumarthatvamiti cedānandānubhavanivṛttyānubhavitrahamarthanivṛttyā cāpumarthatvaṃ prasajyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2460: jñātṛtvāderanātmadharmatvāttannivṛttāvapi na pumarthatopaghāto mukteriti śaṅkate nanu jñātṛtvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2463: tanniṣṭhameva jñātṛtvaṃ jñānātmanā pariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ vikriyātmakaṃ jaḍapariṇāmatvājjaḍaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2471: ātmatvādananyārthatvādajaḍatvādavikriyatvādvā tannaivaṃ yannaivaṃ yathā deha iti prayogā atra garbhitāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2475: jñātṛvyatiriktasya prakāśamātrasyātmano 'nupalambhabādhamuktvā pratyaktvabalādevāhamarthatvamātmana eṣitavyamityāha dehendriye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2488: sarvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jñātnātmana eva bhāsate na jñānamātnāya/
GSP33yaatsi_u:2489: tataśca jñāturevātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyetyāha sarvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2492: kintu jñātureveti tasyaivātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2494: na hi kāpilamata iva jñānapariṇāmitvaṃ jñātṛtvamiṣyate śrutyantahārdābhijñaiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2502: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari kartāśāstrārthavattvā diti hi vedavedāntahārdābhijñāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2511: evamātmana eva jñātṛtvamahaṃ tvaṃ ca mukhyamityuktvā prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣe buddhyākhye mahattatve tatkārye 'haṅkāre vā jñātṛtvamanupapannamityāha na cāvyākṛte ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2515: mahānahaṅkāro vā na jñātā anātmatvāt pariṇāmitvājjaḍatvātparārthatvādvā dehavaditi prayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2516: nanu jñātṛtvasyāsaṃbhave 'pi cicchāyāpatyā citsaṃparkādvā tatna jñātṛtvapratītirastvityatnāha naca citī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2520: yena tatsaṃparkāttatna jñātṛtvaṃ tatpratibhānaṃ vā bhavet agnisaṅgādayasi auṣṇyabhānavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2521: sāṃsargiko guṇo doṣo vā tatna tatna jāyate jñāyate ceti jāyeta jñāyeta vetyuktiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2522: atha jñātṛtvapratīternirvāhāya parābhimatamahaṅkārasya saṃvidabhivyañjakatvapakṣa- manuvadati yadyucyete tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2532: na tvātmana ityāha ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2534: ata eva caitanyamātratayā'tmanaḥ svāpemuktau ca bhānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2554: na khalu sarvaṃ sādhayataḥ svataḥsiddhasya ca sadānubhavātmanaḥ prakāśakāntarāpekṣā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2561: tathābhūtāśca dinakaramarīcayaḥ sphuṭamupalabhyanta iti na karatalavyaṅgyatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2571: sa hi vedyagatajñānodayapratibandhakāpanayanena vā dīpeneva santamasanirasanena cakṣuṣaḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2575: ajñānaṃ tu jñānasamānāśrayaviṣayatayā na tadubhayabhāvavirahiṇi bhavadabhimatasākṣiṇi nikṣepamarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2577: tathaiva na jātucit jñātṛtvaṃ jñānamātrasyeti na tasyāpyajñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2582: na ca tadviṣayatvamātmatayābhimata syānubhavasyeṣyata iti tatratyamajñānaṃ na kenacitkadāciducchidyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2583: jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ cājñānaṃ na jñānotpattipratibandhakamiti śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2592: niyamena tadvyaṅgyasvarūpasya tadvyañjakatvaṃ hi viruddhamiti proktam/
GSP33yaatsi_u:2594: mithyāpadārthasya pratibhāsādhīnasattākasya pratibhāsābhāve sattāyā eva dirlabhatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2598: tathā cānyonyāśrayaḥ-saṃvitprakāśādhīno 'haṅkāraprakāśaḥ ahaṅkāraprakāśādhīnaśca saṃvidaḥ prakāśa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2599: uktalakṣaṇātprātikūlyādvādhakopanipātānna mitho vyaṅgyavyañjakatvaṃ saṃvidahaṅkārayoḥ saṃbhavatīti ca tātparyāntaraṃ varṇitaṃ śrīmannigamāntagurucaraṇaistattvaṭīkāyām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2605: saṃhatānāṃ ca teṣāṃ sphuṭaprakāśaḥ svata evetyāha karatalasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2608: abhivyaktiprakārāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ prakṛte 'nupapatterapi nāhaṅkārasya tadabhivyañjakatvamityāha api ce tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2611: saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena tadviṣayakajñānajanakatvamapi tadabhivyañjakatvamahaṅkārasya neti prakāśanaprakāśakajñānajanakatvarūpābhivyañjakatvaprakāradvayaṃ dūṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2615: tadanugrahaprakārāḥ prakṛte na saṃbhavantīti vadan anugrahaṃ vikalpayatitāvat sa hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2626: niṣkāmakarmaṇā śamādinācāpākṛtapāparāgādidoṣasya śuddhacittasyaiva hi śāstreṇa tattvajñānotpattiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2628: nanvajñānameva jñānotpattivirodhi vedye 'nubhavātmani vartata iti cettatrāha ajñānam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2634: ajñānaṃ hi jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ tatsamānayogakṣemaṃ vānyat jñātṛtvaprasaktiśūnye bhavadabhimate 'nubhavātmani na ghaṭate ghaṭādāviveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2637: parābhimate 'nubhavātmani ajñānasyopagame 'niṣṭaṃ cāha jñānaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2664: tathā sati sarvasyāpi pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgānna kiñcittathyaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2672: yadi paraṃ parāgarthānanubhavāttamoguṇābhibhavācca na vivicya sphuṭaṃ cakāsti;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2673: bhavadabhimatānubhūtirapi tadānīṃ tathaiva hi prathata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2675: api tvanubhūtimātramajñānasākṣitayāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃvidhaṃ svāpasamayabhavamanubhavaṃ nahi suptotthitaḥ kaścit parāmṛśannupalabdhacaraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2676: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamavediṣamiti parāmarśanādeva tathātvaṃ labhyata iti cet; kathamiva?
GSP33yaatsi_u:2679: api ca suṣuptisamayasiddhamātmānamahamiti parāmṛśya na kiñcidavediṣaṃmiti tasya vedane pratiṣidhyamāne tātkālikīṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2680: vittisiddhimahamarthasya cāsiddhimabhidadhāno 'nubhavavirodhamapi na jānāti devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2682: nanu māmapyahaṃ na jñātavān prasupta ityasti hi prabodhe pratyayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2683_0: satyam; sa tu varṇāśramādiviśiṣṭatayā prabodhasamayasaṃvedyamānaṃ dehinaṃ māmityādāya
GSP33yaatsi_u:2685: evamiva khalvayamanubhavaḥ-atra supto 'hamīdṛśaścetyevaṃ māmapi na jñātavānahamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2686: api ca, ātmā suṣuptau ajñānasākṣitvenā'sta iti hi yauṣmākī sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2688: sa cāyaṃ jānāmīti pratibhāsamāno 'smadartha eveti kathamiva tadānīmahamartho na pratheta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2693: yatastathā sati vaināśikadarśana ivātmanāśa evāpavargaḥ prakārāntareṇa pratijñātaḥ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2697: jñānamapi hi taddharmatvena tasyaiva prakāśate jñānaṃ me jātamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2699: anyaśca-yaḥ sāṃsārikaduḥkhaiḥ duḥkhitvenā'tmānaṃ tattvatobhrāntyā vā pratyeti duḥkhyahamiti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2700: saḥ sarvamidamaniṣṭajātaṃ kathamahamapunarūdayapanudyāvyākulaḥ svastho bhūyāsamiti sañjātamumukṣaḥ tatsādhane pravartate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2703: tataścāsambhavadadhikāritayā sarva eva vedāntavidhayaḥ sarvāṇi ca mokṣaśāstrāṇi prāmāṇyādeva pracyaveran /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2705: na hi mayi naṣṭe 'pi ko 'pi prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti kaścitprekṣāvān prayasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2707: asmatpratyaye yo 'nidamaṃśaḥ cidekarasaḥ prakāśaḥ sa ātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2708: tasmiṃstadbalanirbhāsitatayā lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha evāhaṃ jānāmīti sidhyannartha
GSP33yaatsi_u:2710: ahaṃ jānāmīti sidhyaścetano suṣmadartha iti mātā bandhyetivadvyāhatārthaṃvacaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2717: yo yaḥ svasmai prakāśate sa sarvo 'hamityeva prakāśamānodṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2719: yaḥ punarahamiti na cakāsti nāsau svasmai prakāśate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2729: śrayate hi 'taddhaitatpaśyan ṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ suryaśca ahameva ca vartāmi bhaviṣyāmī'tyādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2730_1: prajñāyate 'hantāhamimāstistro devatāḥ' 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' 'sar ikṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti',
GSP33yaatsi_u:2734: evaṃ ca sākṣādahamarthādātmano vilakṣaṇe 'pi dehe yenā'vyaktikapariṇāmabhedenāhamiti bhramaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2736: bahumantavyajanāvadhīraṇahetuścāsau garvāparaparyāyaḥ tatra tatra śāstreṣu prāyaśoheyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2738: anātmani tu śarīre bhavantī avidyeti yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2749: svagatakalmaṣasya svenaiva kevalena nivartanāyogānna tṛtīyo 'pi kalpaḥ kalpata ityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33yaatsi_u:2750: evaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nirasya parābhimataṃ vyañjakasvabhāvamapi nirasyati nace ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2751: pradīpo hi ghaṭādeḥ prakāśako na svavṛttitayā taṃ prakāśayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2752: na khalvevaṃ pratītiḥ pradīpe ghaṭa iti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2754: kintu yathāvasthitaveṣeṇaiva bhūtale ghaṭa itīti bhavadukte niyame 'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2757: jñānasāmagrīprayojyatvaṃ jñānabhāsakasāmagrībhāsyatvaṃ ca prāmāṇyasyotpattau jñaptau ca svatastvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2763: anyathā tu jāte 'pi prāmāṇyaniścaye 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā nirargalaprasarā bhavedeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2771: darpaṇādi pratihatagateścākṣuṣatejasaḥ pratinivṛtya mukhābhimukhatayā prasaraṇameva mukhasyānyathāpratītau doṣarūpaṃ prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2777: pramāṇādhīnapramitāvahamarthasyāpi hetutvāt pramāṇadoṣasaṃpādakatve tasya na kiñcidapi yathārthajñānaṃ saṃbhavetpramāṇajanyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2783: atha svāpe muktau cāhamarthasya bhānaṃ nāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2784: tannāhamarthasyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti paramatamanūdya nirasyati yattu suṣuptī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2793: tattatparāgarthānubhavitṛtvena sphuṭaṃ jñānajñeyato vivicyā'tmano bhānaṃ svāpe nāstīti paraṃ yadyucyetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2797: viśadabhānābhāve 'pi sūkṣmatayāhamarthasya bhānaṃ parābhimatasaṃvida iva svāpe 'stīti ca hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2807: kiñcidityahamarthasyevāsaṅkocātsaṃvido 'pi kroḍīkārāt saṃvinmātrasyāpi bhānaṃ bhavatāṃ tadābhimataṃ na siddhyedityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2808: nanu kiñciditi jaḍamātrasya parāmarśa iti cettarhyahamarthasyāpi na niṣedhaḥ pratyaktvenājaḍatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2809: yadvā jñeyamātrasya kiñciditi parāmarśo na jñānasyeti cettulyanayena jñāturapi na parāmarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2814: na hi bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyasya ghaṭasadbhāvabhūtalaniṣedhaviṣayakatvaṃ kasyacinmatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2817: nanu saviṣayasaṃvinniṣedhe 'pi nirviśeṣasaṃvitprakāśe na virodha ityatrāha nirviṣaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2819: tacca dharmabhūtaṃ naiva tadā prakāśata iti tu siddhāntinaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2820: svāpe 'hamarthānanubhave pratisandhānāntaraṃ pramāṇatvena śaṅkate nanu mām iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2832: ajñānasākṣitvenā'tmā svāpe prakāśata iti parapakṣarītyāpi tadāhamarthasya bhānamavarjanīyamityāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2836: to 'hamartha eveti ahamajña ityajñānasākṣitayā svāpe 'hamarthabhānaṃ setsyatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2849: ahamarthasya dharmamātratve tannivṛttāvapi muktau ātmā anuvartate iti bhavatkathanaṃ sādhīyo bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2853: dharmatayā pramīyamāṇasya jñānasya na svatantrātmatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2854: antaraṅgasya jñānasyaivā'tmatvāsambhave bahiraṅgasyendriyādeḥ sutarāṃ na sambhāvitamātmatvamityāha kā kathe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2855: jñātṛtayā pramīyamāṇādahamarthādanyasya na kasyāpyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2858: sa cet svasyaiva vināśaṃ muktau jānīyāt na tasyai spṛhayet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2861: tathāca jñāpakatayānuṣṭhāpakatayā ca prāmāṇyaṃ bhajatāṃ mokṣaśāstrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2863: yathā dehagehādyupalakṣitaḥ pṛthivībhāgaḥ sthāsyatīti svadehagehanāśe na pravarteta svayameva kaścit prekṣāpūrvakārī,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2864: evamahamarthopalakṣitaḥ prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti buddhyā na svanāśāya mokṣāya jñātāhamarthaḥ pravarteteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2868: na tu tadbhinnasyāhamarthasyeti pakṣaṃ pratikṣipati etene ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2869: ahaṃ jānāmīti pratyaye caitanyaikarūpaḥ parāgbhinnaḥ pratyak yaḥ jānāmīti pratīyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2871: tasminnadhiṣṭhāne bhāsamānaḥ tadadhīnaprakāśaḥ ahamartho yuṣmadarthalakṣaṇa eva-parāgarthasvarūpaṃ eva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2875: lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha eveti parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasyānātmatve liṅgamuktam lakṣaṇataḥ-svarūpataḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2887: ahamartho yuṣmadartha iti pratijñāvākye virodhamāha aham iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2889: nanu yuṣmadartha iti ḷ ākṣaṇikaṃ parāktvaparam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2891: parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasya cidadhīnaprakāśatvādityatrā'ha na cāsā viti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2897: atha tadā muktasyāhantvena bhāne 'numānaṃ samagrāṅgakanyāyamukhena prapañcayati sa ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2899: evaṃ bhāsamānatve- ahantvena bhāsamānatve muktasya saṃsāriṇa ivājñatvādi nāpādayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2901: muktātmā ajñānavān saṃsaraṇadharmavān vā ahantvena bhāsamānatvāt saṃsāryātmavaditi anumānaṃ muktaviśeṣa- pratipādakaśāstrabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2904: tarhyajñānādimān syāditi prasañjanameva kriyata iti cettatrāpyāha atadupādhitvā diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2920: kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣar iśvara iti hi yogatantre prasiddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2921: sarvadā sarvathāvidyārahitasyeśvarasyāhamiti svātmani pratyayo nāvidyādimūlaḥ saṃbhavediti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2927: naca sopādhirīśvaro 'ntaryāmī muktaprāpyo vā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2928: tathā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgaratārakaṃ śuddhameva svarūpaṃ bhagavato 'hamiti nirdiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaha mityatra /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2933: kintu sarvajñamiti jñāpanāya copāttaṃ vedāham iti vacanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2936: nanvevamahambhāvasyā'tmasvarūpatve 'haṅkārasya kṣetrāntarbhāvavacanaṃ tyājyatvapratipādanaṃ ca gītāsthaṃ kathamityatrā'ha evaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2940: tathā cānahami dehe 'hamabhimānaheturanātmani ātmabhramaheturahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrāntargatatvenopadiṣṭa iti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2941: atha ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpam iti tyājyatvenoktasyāhaṅkārasyābhijanādinimittadurabhimānamūlagarvarūpatvamāha bahumantavye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2946: cvyarthamanantarbhāvya tu vyutpanno 'haṅkāra iti ātmani ahaṃ buddhivācīti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2951: ātmanyeṣa na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvija /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2957: dehātmabhramākāraparīkṣāto 'pi svīkāryamahamarthatvamātmana ityāha na ca jñaptī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2974: na khalu sukhaduḥkhecchādayo vidyamānā api kadācidamavabhāsamānā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2978: yadi matam-avyabhicaritaprakāśo 'pi sukhādiranyasmai prakāśata iti ghaṭa iva jaḍatāṃ nātivartate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2981: anyasyaiva hi tadapi jānato 'hamarthasya prathate 'haṃ jānāmīti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2984: ataḥ sattayaiva svamātmānaṃ prati sidhyannajaḍo 'hamartha evātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2986: ata eva hi svāśrayacetanaṃ prati prakaṭatā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2993: tadapi hi tena niyatena sahopalambhamityahamarthādanarthāntaraṃ mithyārūpamevā'padyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2996: na ca viśeṣamātraṃ nirdhūtanikhilaviṣayaviśeṣopaśleṣaṃ vā vittimātramasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3004: api ca nilataddhiyoriti dve upādāya abheda ityekatvavidhiḥ savitrīvandhyātvavidhiriva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3019: sa ca sarvadāhamiti bhāsate iti kārikārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3026: atha jñānasyā'tmatve sādhakatvena parairupanyastamajaḍatvamapi vikalpya dūṣayati yadukta mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3033: anātmasu sukhādiṣvapi niruktājaḍatvasya sattvāt vyabhicāra ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3050: tatprakāśaṃ nityamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya svasattāprayuktatvakīrtanaṃ viruddhaṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3052: svasmai svayaṃ bhāsamānatvarūpamajaḍatvamātmatve sādhakaṃ tu svarūpāsiddhamityāha yadi matam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3068: saṃvida ātmatvamādhakamajaḍatvaṃ pradūṣya jñātrādeḥ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ dūṣayati naca jñānene ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3072: ahamarthena sahaivopalambhaṃ saṃvida upapādayati tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3076: kiñca, tadupalambhavyāpyopalambhavattvarūpo hi sahopalambhaniyamaḥ paraiḥ tadabhedasādhako mataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3077: sa cāyamahamarthasya saṃvidabhedasādhane pakṣe 'siddha ityāha asiddhaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3078: atra vikalpaḥ-kiṃ jñānaviśeṣeṇa tena tena sahopalambhaniyamo 'hamarthasya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3082: cākṣuṣādijñānaprakāśamantarāpi ahamarthasya jñānāntaraprakāśe prakāśamānatvāditi pratyekaṃ vyabhicāradarśanā dityuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3084: na nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyam iti nyāyāccākṣuṣādivyatiriktaṃ jñānaviśeṣamātraṃ jñānamātraṃ vā nāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3089: vināpi jñānaprakāśenāhamarthaprakāśo 'stītyāha siddhāntarītyā ca samaste ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3091_1: iti tena saṃvidahamarthayoraikyasādhane pratijñāhetuvākyayorvirodha ekaṃ dvitvāditivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3093: sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyo rityevaṃ hi teṣāṃ pratijñā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3098: tathā ca saṃvidā sahopalambhaniyamabhājāṃ jaḍatvamūrtatvādīnāṃ saṃvidabhede saṃvido jaḍatvamūrtatvādiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3104: abhedasādhakaṃ hetvantaramapi tulyarītyā nirasyati niyamenaike ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3121: naca pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ vā bhedasyā'parokṣye tvapekṣitavyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3123: anavabhāsamāne 'pi pratiyogini bhāvāḥ svarūpata eva vilakṣaṇāḥ pratyakṣyanta iti sarvalokasvasākṣikametat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3124: nanu jīvato bhedapratyakṣasya śirasi padanidhānena sahopalambhaniyamasyābhedena pratibandhagrahaṇamiti kathamiva tatastadvādhasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3127: tatra hi kḷptakāraṇadoṣānuvṛttau satyāṃ jāyamāno 'parokṣāvabhāso na niravadyapratyakṣapūrvakamanumānaṃ bādhitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3128: tathāhi-aciranirvāpitāropiteṣvekavartibhāgavartiṣu bahuṣudīpeṣu tadbhedādarśinaḥ susadṛśatayā sa evāyamiti smṛtirupajāyate iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3142: aprakāśātmanaśca nīlādeḥ prakāśa ityanubhavasiddhatvānna samarthanāntaraṃ prārthayate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3147: ātmā tu svatantro jñātā ahamiti pratyātmaṃ prathate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3153: ata eva hi cchandogāḥ-'atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā' ityādyāmananti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3154: tathā 'katama ātmā' iti praśnapūrvakamidameva lakṣaṇamāmananti vājasaneyinaḥ 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3155: atra hi yo 'yaṃ sarvalokānubhavasiddho vividhaviṣayavedanapracuraḥ prāṇeṣu prerakatayā sthito hṛdayāyatane antarjyotiḥ ahamiti pratyaktvena prakāśate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3157: 'eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ' ityātharvaṇāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3158_0: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāditi' 'na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām'
GSP33yaatsi_u:3158_1: 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ nopajanaṃ smarannidaṃ śarīram' 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśakalāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3159: 'satyaṃ jñāna' mityatrāpi brahmalakṣaṇanirdeśe jñānaśabdo na jñānamātravacanaḥ ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3165: aitareyopaniṣadapi 'prajñānaṃ brahye'tyuktvā 'sa etena prājñenātmanā' iti prakṛṣṭajñānavantameveśvaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3168: kiṃ punarasmin dehādivyatirekiṇi cetane pratyagātmani pramāṇam? / anu
GSP33yaatsi_u:3182: evamāśrayamātramupasthāpayanto 'nvayavyatirekiṇo hetavaḥ dravyāntaraguṇatvaṃ ca pratyācakṣāṇaiḥ kevalavyatirekisādhanairātmagocaratayā niyamyante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3190: nāpi tadguṇānāṃ pratyakṣatvamiti na teṣāmapi guṇāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3192: tenecchādayo na śarīraguṇāḥ tadguṇabhāvāpavādapramāṇavattve sati guṇatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3197: vimatipadāspadebhyaḥ śarīrādibhyor'thāntaraguṇā icchādaya iti vā pratijñā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3200: sāmānyena vānvayaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ-yo yadguṇabhāvāpavādakapramāṇavattve sati guṇaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3213: naca sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvadarśanamātreṇa sādhyānvitasvabhāvatvaṃ śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3230_0: ahaṅkārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānena ” devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ ” ityādyāgamabalena prakāśalāghavaguṇānvayena
GSP33yaatsi_u:3242_1: tadarthaṃ ca śāstrāṇāṃ mahādhiyāṃ ca pravṛtterasti dehādivyatirikto 'saṃhataḥ traiguṇyādyasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3244: atrāpi saṅghātapārārthyādibhiryadyapi paraḥ ko 'pyadhiṣṭhātā draṣṭā siddhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3254: na ca tathā sāṅkhyapuruṣa iti kataṃ tasya saṅghātaṃ prati paratvam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3259: na khalu bālāstalamalinatādimattayā gaganamabhimanyanta iti tasya tathātvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3260: api ca tathāvidhabhramo 'pi kasya kathamudayata iti vivecanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3263: antaḥkaraṇaṃ tu buddhyaparaparibhāṣābhidhānamacetanatayā tanuriva na bhrāmyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3264: acidapi svacchatayā citicchāyāpannaṃ cetanāyata iti cet; na;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3275: yathā'ha tatrabhavān patañjaliḥ ” yadā citireva puruṣaḥ kimatra kena vyapadiśyata ” iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3280: api ca citisannidhānādhīnāṃ buddhisiddhimabhidadhānaḥ kathamiva tadajaḍimānaṃ pratijānīyāt?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3289: naca dṛśimātrātmavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ tadupajīvināṃ ca pracchannānāṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ vāstavamasti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3292_0: rājā tu sāmānyato viśeṣato vā teṣu karmasvamātyān niyuñjānaḥ tatphalamaiśvaryādi
GSP33yaatsi_u:3296: 'sa eṣa neti neti' 'akāyamavraṇamasnāviraṃ śuddhamapāpaviddham' 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3297: sthāṇumanye' 'na jāyate mriyate vā kadācit' 'jīvāpetaṃ vāvakiledaṃ mriyate' 'na hi vai saśarīrasya sataḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3299: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' ityādyāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3302: nanu hitāhitaprāptiparihāramātraparasyā'mnāyasya śirasi kimiti mahānayaṃ bhāraḥ prakṣipyate?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3305: idamahaṃ jānāmīti ghaṭādidṛśyebhya ivāyaṃ draṣṭā dehādapi pṛthagbhūtaḥ pratyakṣaṃ parisphurati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3309: na cendriyāṇi rūpādivyatirekiṇi niratiśayasūkṣme pratīci parāgartha iva sannikarṣeṇa jñānaṃ janayitumarhanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3313: utāho tadabhedataḥ-saṃvidabhinnatvāt prakāśamanurudhyate iti saṃdehānnīlatadviyorabhedo 'śakyanirṇaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3315: idaṃ ca kiṃ saṃvidabhedaprayuktamuta svaprakāśe nīlāderjaḍasya svaprakāśasaṃvidapekṣāprayuktamiti viśaye yāvadabhedaprayuktatvanirṇayo na bhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3325: kintu bodhyayoreva tathābhūtayorabheda iṣyatāṃ guṇaguṇiprabhṛtyoḥ kathañcidityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3331: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti hi sphuṭo jñeyajñātṛjñānānāṃ bhedapratibhāsaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3336: prakṛte saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena svayaṃprakāśatvāttadbhedapratyakṣaṃ jñātari na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3346: pratiyoginaḥ prakṛte vedanasya prakāśastu svata evāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3349: sa ca pratiyogyanavabhāse 'pi bhāsata evotyāha anavabhāsamāna iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3350: tathā ca jñāturahantvena bhānameva saṃvidbhedagrahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3357: tattadasādhāraṇa dharmasyaivetarabhedarūpatvāttasya ca dharmiṇi prathamakṣaṇa eva gṛhīteḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3358: ata evāpūrvavastudarśane vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ kaścana padārtha iti bhedapratītirlokasammatā svānubhavasiddhā ca nāpahnavārhā iti sarvalokasvasākṣika mityuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3366: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- bhinnatvena gṛhyamāṇayoreva hi sahopalambhaniyamo 'bhedavyāpyatvena gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3367: tena cābhedānumāne pratyakṣe bhedagrahaṇāṃśobhramalakṣaṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3374: tatre ti / na pratyakṣatvamanumānatvaṃ vā bādhyatve bādhakatve vā prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3382: nirvāpaṇapunaruddīpanadraṣṭuśca jvālayorbhedaprtyakṣaṃ vartata iti tena bādhitatvamapi nirvāpaṇādyadraṣṭṛniṣṭha jvālayokyapratyakṣe viva
GSP33yaatsi_u:3389: evaṃ pūrvottaradīpajvālayorbhede siddhe sajātīyadīpadhārāyāṃ bhedāgrahātsādṛśyarūpadoṣadarśanāccaikyabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3393: dṛṣṭāntitāt dārṣṭāntike vaiṣamyamupapādayati na caivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3397: viparītaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyatrāha na copalabdhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3400: vipakṣe bādhakatarkavirahādvyāptyasiddhyāsiddhamabhedānumānaṃ na jñānajñātṛjñeyabhedapratyakṣe bādhakatvena śakyaśaṅkamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3403: atra bādhakapratyayo 'pi nāsti candradvitvabhrama ivetyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3404: na caivamihe ti vākyābhipretamanena vākyadvayena vivṛtam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3405: saṃvidadhīne tivākyoktaṃ prapañcayati api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3408: nanu saṃvidamantarāpi viṣayādiḥ sidhyatvityatrāha na ca bhedo 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3414: bhedapratibhāso 'pi saṃvidaiva vācya iti niruktahetorbhedasyāpi saṃvidabhede bhedaghaṭito heturapi na sidhyediti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3415: yadvā bhavadabhimataḥ saṃvidāṃ bhedopi na sidhyediti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3416: evaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ pradūṣya pracchannasaugatābhimataṃ prakāśasvabhāvatvamapi dūṣayati aprakāśe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3423: na sādhyamityāha na ca tāvate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3432: dhārāvāhikavijñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ mataṃ hi naḥ iti pakṣe tu svarūpata evānuvartamānaṃ yāvadviṣayāntarasaṃcāramiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3435: nanvevaṃ jñānabhinnatve ātmano jñānamiti vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha yadī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3444: tataśca jñāturātmano jñānābhedānumānaṃ parābhimataṃ prabalapratyakṣabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3445: pratyakṣatarkasiddhamātmano jñātṛtvamāgamato 'pi pratiṣṭhāpayati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3449: jñātṛtvaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśatvājjñānaśabditasyātmanaḥ pratipādayadvākyam eṣa hī tyādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3454: muktidaśāyāṃ jñānābhāvaśrutirheyadarśanābhāvapareti na paśya ityādi vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3456: bhagavadvibhūtitayā hi sarvasya svānukūlatvena darśanaṃ tadā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3459: sa tatra paryetī tyādi nopajanaṃ smaran ityantamatrodāhāryat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3462: evaṃ jñātṛtvamātmano vyavasthāpya paramātmano 'pi tadvyavasthāpayati satyam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3474: dehendriyamanaḥ prāṇadhībhyo 'nya iti pratijñātātmasvarūpanirūpaṇamupasaṃharati tatsiddham iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3475: atha ananyasādhana iti pratijñātaṃ svayaṃprakāśatvamātmanaḥ samarthayituṃ pramāṇaparīkṣāmupakramate kiṃ puna rityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3477: yadyapyahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣameva tatra pramāṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3479: athāpi vilakṣaṇātmaviṣayatvaṃ pratyakṣasyedaṃ pramāṇamatraivaṃ pravartitumarhatītyevaṃ sāmagrīnirūpaṇādyātmakena tarkeṇaiva vyavasthāpyamityāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3485: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- vyāptigrahasya sahacāradarśanamūlakatvena vilakṣaṇātmanā sahacāradarśane icchādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva tasya siddheḥ kṛtamanumānena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3499: atra hetuṃ sādhayati guṇatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3500: padārthatvena dravyādyanyatamatve prāpte dravyādibhedakānumānato dravyatvādivyudāse dravyādibhedaviśiṣṭaṃ padārthatvameva pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ guṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3509: guṇatvaṃ prasādhya viśeṣaguṇatvaṃ prasādhayati viśeṣe ti/
GSP33yaatsi_u:3522: parantu prabhātvajāteḥ prāmāṇikatve vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā guṇatvadalamāvaśyakameveti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3549: na caivaṃ sādhyavyatirekasyāpyanumānātpūrvamaprasiddhyā vyatirekyudāharaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ ghaṭata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3551: anvayavyāptirvā sāmānyamukhī sambhavatītyāha sāmānyato ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3554: evaṃ ca kevalavyatirekyanupagame 'pi na kṣatiriti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3555: naiyāyikābhimatāṃ vilakṣaṇātmasiddhimānumānikīṃ pratikṣipanti śrotriyāḥ idamapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3556: anvayināśrayamātrasya siddhāvapi kevalavyatirekiṇā'śrayaviśeṣaḥ setsyatītyatrāha kevale ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3563: evaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo 'pi vyāptigrahāyogāt na gamakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3565: kevalavyatirekiṇi tu sapakṣasyaiva virahānna doṣa iti cet;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3568: asti cedyatra prasiddhiḥ tatra hetoḥ sattve 'nvayitvam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3570: nāsti cet sādhyavyatirekasyāpyaprasiddheḥ kevalavyatirekitvamapi durghaṭamiti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3577: anvayavyatirekiṇi ubhayavidhasahacāradarśanādvyāptigrahasya dṛṣṭeḥ sādhyahetvo sahacārādarśanātkevalavyatirekiṇo 'sādhakatvaṃ cedabhimatam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3580_0: kasmiṃściddeśe kāle vā hetuḥ sādhyamantarāpi prayojakāntarāt syāditi deśakālaviśeṣāntarbhāveṇa
GSP33yaatsi_u:3584: vyatirekavyāptigraha eva vyatirekasahacāragrahasyāpekṣayā kevalānvayini anvayavyāptigrahasya vyatirekāprasiddhāvapi nānupapattiriti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3585: vipakṣasattksyaivāprasiddhyaiva rūpapañcakasampattiḥ kevalānvayina iti cāśayaḥ siddhāntinām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3586: nanvevaṃ sādhyasādhanavyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyatirekavyāptigraha upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca sādhanābhāva iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3592: nanu yāvatsu pratyakṣeṣvadhikaraṇeṣu vyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyāptirniścīyetetyatrāha sandehe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3595: hetvabhāvo māstviti śaṅkāyāṃ ca na sādhanābhāvavyāpyatvaṃ sādhyābhāve gṛhyetānukūlatarkavirahe / sādhyasyā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3597: viśiṣṭahetunā pṛthivyādivyatiriktaguṇatvānumāne ca sādhyāprasiddhimāha pṛthivyādibhya iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3601: niruktasamavetatvasya guṇakriyābhinna eva prasiddherguṇe jñānādau tatsādhanāyogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3605: vilakṣaṇātmasādhakatvena sāṅkhyābhimatāneva hetūn prathamaṃ vivṛṇumahe śiṣyavaiśadyāya kṣepasaukaryāya ceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3619: sādhyaghaṭakasya ca parasyābhimatāsaṃhatatvaviruddhasya saṃhatatvasyā'pādakatvādviruddhatvaṃ saṅghātatvahetoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3622: ahaṅkāravṛttau satyāmevendriyāṇāṃ manaḥparyantānāṃ vṛtterdarśanāttadabhāve ca svāpe 'darśanādāhaṅkārikatvaṃ teṣāmavasīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3634: asaṃhatasyāpyātmanaścetanatvādeva bhoktṛtvasyopapatteḥ bhoktatvalakṣaṇe paratve prādhānye saṅghātatvasyāprayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3635: yadi saṅghātatvasya paratve prayojakatvaṃ syāttarhi saṃhataparārthatvena vyāptiḥ sambhavennāma saṅghātatvasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3638: tathā ca saṃhataparārthatve saṅghātatvasya vyāpyatvāsiddhatvamiti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3640: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptistu pramāṇāntaravirodhābhāvātprasetsyatītyāha na ca pramāṇāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3643: parasya saṃhatatve 'navasthāprasakteḥ traiguṇyaviparyayaḥ atraiguṇyātmakatvarūpo mantavya ityuktam asaṃhata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3659_0: evaṃ sukhenānukūlanīyasya duḥkhena pratikūlanīyasya vā bhoktuḥ triguṇatve tasyāpi
GSP33yaatsi_u:3661: kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteśce tyaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti tathā dehāde riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3666: dehādeḥ pradhānaparyantasya pariṇāmasvabhāvasya triguṇasya kaivalyānupapattijñānācca vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3676: evamuparyuparīti kāraṇaparamparākalpanā yathā prāmāṇikī na doṣāya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3678: nanu saṅghātatvasya bhoktṛtvalakṣaṇe paratve 'hetutvānna saṅghātaparārthatvena saṅghātatvasya vyāptigraha ityatrā'ha na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3685: atastadadhīnātiśayabhāktvarūpe tatparatve saṅghātatvasya prayojakatvena tadavacchinnaparārthatvena vyāptigrahaḥ sambhavatyeveti cābhimatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3687: yadyenopakriyate kriyate vā tattasya śeṣi pradhānamaṅgi bhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3688: yattūpakaroti karoti vā tattadarthaṃ taccheṣaḥ tadaṅgamityanvayārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3700: nanvanupakāryatve 'pyātmana etairupakṛto 'hamityupakṛtatvabhramalakṣaṇa evopakāro dehādibhiḥ sādhya iti tatparatvamupapadyata iti cettatrāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3710: chāyāyāḥ kāntilakṣaṇāyā ujjavalarūpavaddharmabhūtāyā nīrūpe caitanye 'sambhavānnīrūpe cāntaḥkaraṇe tatpratiphalanalakṣaṇasaṅkrānterayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3711: rūpavatyeva hi sphaṭikādau japākusumalohitādipratiphalanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3722: bhramādayo hi vṛttayo 'ntaḥkaraṇasya nirvṛttikatve nopapadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3732: tathā caivaṃvidhājaḍatvasya jñātṛtvasamānāśrayatvājjñātṛtvenaiva jñātṛtvasamanarthanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3739: yadvā na kiñcidetat-anatiprasaktaṃ prakṛtārthopapādakaṃ durnirūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3740: antaḥkaraṇasyājaḍatvopagame sāṅkhyasyāpasiddhāntaṃ cāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3741: nanvantaḥkaraṇasya citisārūpyāsambhave 'pi tasmin citipratibimba eva jñātṛtvādimānastu ityatrāha na ca citī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3745: bimbagatasya vakratādeḥ pratibimbādhāragatasya vā mālinyādeḥ pratibimbe āropasambhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3746: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ bhramo vā prakṛte 'nyatarasminnapyasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3751: tataśca citibuddhyorvivekāgrahācciti jñātṛtvapratibhāso yujyata eveti śaṅkate yaducyata ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3752: nirvikārāyā api citiśakteḥ sannidhānabalādevāntaḥkaraṇasya pratyakṣādipramāṇajñānabhrāntyādilakṣaṇā vṛttibhedāḥ samudayante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3753: prādhānyāt citeḥ tāsāṃ sākṣitvaṃ bhoktatvaṃ ca,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3754: yathā niśceṣṭasyāpi sārvabhaumasya prādhānyāt prabalasāmantacakrakartṛkayuddhaparākramavijayabhāktvaṃ tadvaditi śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3760: draṣṭṛtvaṃ kalpitamiti cet nirvikāre nirdharmake kūṭasthe caitanye draṣṭṛtvabhramo 'pi na sambhavatītyuktameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3761: dṛṣṭānte tu na nirvyāpāratvaṃsārvabhaumasya nirdharmakatvaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3766: nanu sāṅkhyābhimatasyātmano 'numānāsambhave 'pi naiyāyikādibhirādheyātiśayatvena bhoktatvena cābhimatasyātmanaḥ saṅghātaparārthatvānumānena sādhanaṃ syāditi cet, na /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3767: saṅghātasya saṃhataparārthatvena vyāprerasaṃhatasya parasya siddherayogāt / naca
GSP33yaatsi_u:3771: śarīrādivyatiriktasya bhoktaranumānātpūrvamasiddhyā ca vilakṣaṇabhoktrarthatvena vyāpteragrahādvilakṣaṇātmasādhanāyoga iti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3776: dehādibhede ātmanaḥ śrutimeva pramāṇatayopanyasyanti śrotriyāḥ sa eṣa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3784: tathāca dehāderevotpattyādi nātmana ityatra śrutirna jāyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3787: muktautvaśarīratvamevetyatra śrutimupādatte na ha vai iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3788: śrutiṃ pramāṇamuktvā vilakṣaṇātmani śrutyarthāpattimapi pramāṇamāha kālāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3792: dehavināśordhvabhāvisvargādisādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ tadvidhānaṃ vā bhoktarātmano dehātirekaṃ nityatvaṃ ca vinā hi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3795: śāstratastu vilakṣaṇātmana upakaraṇatvenaiva tatsiddhiriti vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiḥ śāstrato niṣpratyūheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3796: vilakṣaṇātmani anumānaikapramāṇakatvamāgamaikapramāṇakatvaṃ ca matabhedenopapādya pratyakṣatvaṃ mīmāṃsakamatena nirūpayitumupakramate nanu hitāhite ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3803: pratyakṣeṇaiva sphuṭamadhigamyata iti nātra purovāditālakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sambhavatīti śrotriyopari pratyavasthānaṃ mīmāṃsakasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3804: ātmana indriyāgrāhyatvaṃ śaṅkate 'tra śrotriyaḥ maivaṃ voca ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3809: yogya eva hi pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati nāyogya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3823: kḷptaṃ ca bahirindriyāgocare 'pi sukhādau svāntasvātantryamiti tannimitta evāyamahaṃpratyayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3824: prayogaśca bhavati-ātmā mānasapratyakṣagrāhyaḥ bahirindriyāyogyatve sati pratyakṣatvātsukhādivat iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3833: tadaiva kiṃ tata eva tadgocaramapi vedanaṃ janyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3843: kāryavirodhitve cānantarameva saṃskārodayānna kālāntare sthitiriti saṃvido na mānasapratyakṣavedyatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3849: na hi tasminnapratyakṣe tatpauṣkalyaṃvaikalyaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3862: ekasya cātmano niraṃśasya na svāpekṣayā grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3874: ucyate / aho khalu svānubhava eva vibhramaḥ parīkṣakāṇām,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3875: yat viṣayānubhavasamaye pūrvāvasthāto na kañcidviśeṣamayamātmano 'vabudhyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3878: mama vā pratibhāsate parasya vetyapi na vidma iti na
GSP33yaatsi_u:3881: so 'yaṃ parasaṃcetitāt svasaṃcetitasyātiśayaḥ sarvatra parisphurannasati grāhakāvabhāse nopapadyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3911: tathā prapañcitaṃ prathamādhikaraṇa iti nātropakṣipya pratikṣeptavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3912: sato 'pi prameyajātasya svāpādisamaye 'nupalabderabhyupagataṃ tāvat saṃvidaḥ tatsādhakatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3916: tat upapattibhirupapadyamānamapi yathāpratīti vyavaharatāṃ na cittamanurañjayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3920: yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti cātra prayogaḥ //17//
GSP33yaatsi_u:3936: tatra saṃvidi hetau viśeṣaṇāṃśasya siddhatvādviśeṣyāṃśaṃ tāvatsādhayati na ca tadi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3939: nanu jñātatayaiva jñānānumānamityananyopādhikatvaṃ jñānapratibhāsasyāsiddhamityatrāha apratyakṣatve ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3941: satyā api tasyā atīndriyatvena jñānasya tenāvinābhāvagrahāyogāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3942: jñānajanakasāmagryā jñātatāyā eva sākṣājjananasambhavādantarā jñānakalpanāyā apārthatvāccāsiddhireva syājjñānasyāpratyakṣatva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3943: saṃvedane sādhyasyāpi sattvamāśaṅkate na ca tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3950: pratyakṣe viṣayasya hetutvātpūrvajñānajanitasyottarajñānasyānuvyavasāyarūpasya pūrvajñānaviṣayakatvamupapadyeta kramabhāvitve na tu yaugapadya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3951: astu tarhi kramikatvaṃ viṣayajñānatadanuvyavasāyayorityatraha asame ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3953: jñānasya kṣaṇikatvānupagame doṣamāha bhāve ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3956: kintu svakāryeṇaiva nivṛttiriṣyate jñānasyeti cettatrāha kārye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3960: atra tu sahānavasthānalakṣaṇa eva virodho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3969: athāpi siddhāntaprakriyayā jñānāvasthārūpatvātsukhādeḥ jñānasya ca svayaṃprakāśatvātsvayaṃprakāśatvaṃ sukhāderhṛdi nidhāya sādhyavikalatvameva kīrtitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3970: anvayaddaṣṭānte sādhyasya sādhanasya vā virahena tadavacchedena sādhyavyāptigraho hetau sambhavatīti vyāpyatvāsiddhirvivakṣitā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3974: ahaṃ cakṣuṣmān paśyāmīti pratyakṣavadavabhāsaścakṣurādeḥ kadāciccākṣuṣādivṛtti kāle nānācakṣurādivṛtti pratisandhānavataścetanasyendriyaviṣayasaṃskāraprācuryaprayuktaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3978: kāmasaṅkalpādīnāṃ manovṛttirūpatvaṃ kāmaḥsaṅkalpaḥ- sarvaṃ mana eve ti śrutyāpratīyate / teṣāṃ ca
GSP33yaatsi_u:3982: ātmana āgantukadharmarūpatvaṃ ca matabhedena prasiddhamanuvadati yastusugate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3986: nityasyātmana āgantukadharmarūpatvaṃ vā manyamānābhyāṃ nyāyatattvaśāstrasthaṃ sukhaduḥkhādhikaraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3988: nanu sukhaduḥkhayoḥ mānasapratyakṣatve vivāde 'pi rāgadveṣāveva nidarśane bhaviṣyata ityatrāha sukhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3989: sukhatvaprayuktaṃ viṣayīkaraṇamupādeyatāprakāśanaṃ yataḥ tajjñānameva rāgaḥ sukhagocaropādeyatābuddhilakṣaṇa iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3990: tasya sukhasya virodha upaghāto yena tadgocaratyājyatāprakāśakajñānameva ca dveṣaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3991: tayośca jñānavadeva prakāśa iti naṃ sādhyānvaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3997: tayoścāntaḥkaraṇadharmatvādeva na pratyakṣatvamiti dṛṣṭāntatvāyoga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3998: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatve sādhakasyāsambhavamuktvā bādhakamapyāha ekasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4004: anyadā cāṃśāntareṇaitadaṃśagrahaṇamiti kālabhedenopapatternānavastheti cettatrāpyāha saṅghātatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4005: ātmano niraṃśatvaviruddhaṃ ca sāṃśatvamevaṃ sati prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4010: evaṃ prābhākareṇa dūṣite svapakṣe bhāṭṭastanmatamapi dūṣayati nanu ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4013: atra na ca grāhakābhāsa iti pāṭhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4015: svasiddhāntetyataḥ pūrvaṃ sa tu iti yojyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4019: anubhavaviruddhaṃ hi na śrutiḥ pratipādayediti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4021: svasiddhāntābhimānibhiḥ prābhākarairabhihito grāhakāvabhāso na mantavyaḥ pratītivirodhāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4025: yasya yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ tasyaiva sor'thaḥ prakāśata iti prākaṭyasyā'tmapratiyogikatvamarthadharmasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4030: atra ca mānasapratyakṣe jñānavattvena viṣayatvaṃ dehādimattayā cāśrayatvamiti karmakartṛvirodhaparihāro 'bhimato bhāṭṭānām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4036: viṣayavedanakāle jñānasya jñātuścāvabhāsābhāve doṣaṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati ukta mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4038: jñātuḥ prakāśābhāve mama jñāyate 'nyasya veti saṃśayādiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4044: na tu jānāmīti jñāne vartamānatvollekha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4045: nanvatiśaighryāt kṣaṇabhedāgrahanibandhano vartamānatvāṃśe bhramalakṣaṇo jānāmīti pratyaya iti śaṅkāyāṃ tanmate dūṣaṇāntaramapi saṃsphorayati jñāne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4047: jñātatāliṅgakamapi jñānānumānaṃ jñānena jñātatāyā avinābhāvagrahāsambhavājjñānasāmagryaivānyathāsiddhatvācca jñātatāyā duḥsthameveti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4048: viṣayajñāna eva jñātuḥ prakāśaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mānasapratyakṣaṃ ca nirasyati mānase ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4053: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatvaṃ ca vyabhicārātsādhakatvābhimatasya nirastaṃ sādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4097: paraprakāśakatvenaiṣṭavyāyāḥ saṃvida eva pramātravabhāsakatvamapi yuktamiti nātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvamapi kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4133: tanmātranimittatve ca sarvadā ātmasvarūpavattadapi vidyata iti saṃsārānavatāraprasaṅgāt,

GSP33yaatsi_u:4196: mokṣakāle jñānasyātmaviṣayakasya sarvaviṣayakasya vā dharmajanyatve janyabhāvasya vināśitvaniyamātpunarajñānādiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4424: karmānuguṇyena suramanujādijātīyatayā bhidyamānāsvāgamāpāyinīṣu tanuṣu manasa ivaikasya varṣmaṇaḥ svabhāvānubandhitvenāśrayitumaśakyatvāt /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4436: bodhasvābhāvye hi puruṣasya svāpādidaśāsu ca tathābhāvo 'bhimata eveti na hi tadāpādanaṃ doṣāya /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4467: asaṃprajñātasamādhāvapi paramavairāgyaśālinā paṭutaranirodhasaṃskāreṇa caritādhikāriṇā apavargiṇā viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4469: kathaṃ punarnidrāyā avṛttitve prabuddhasya pratyavamarśāḥ sukhamahamasvāpsamityādyāḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:4476: sattvarajasī tvabhibhūya nitāntamudbhūte tamasi gāḍhamūḍhaṃ supto 'smi,

GSP33yaatsi_u:4506: na svataḥ iti pratyavasthānaprasaṅge jñānasya nityatvaṃ tāvadvyavasthāpayati atrāhu riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4509: ātmasvarūpanirūpakadharmatvācca jñānasya na jñānarahitamātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ vyavatiṣṭeta prakāśarahitamiva tejaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4512: nanu jñānābhāve 'pi jñānaśaktimadātmasvarūpaṃ muktikāla ityatrāha citiśaktaye ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4539: ato boddhṛtvapratipattirātmana upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca citimātre ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4540: viṣayacaitanyasaṃbandhasya bodhatvābhimatasya saṃyogarūpatve tasya dviṣṭhatvādviṣayasyāpi boddhṛtvaprasaṅga ityāha sambandhasye ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4548: kāraṇatvaṃ ca kāryanirūpitaṃ kāraṇaniṣṭhaṃ svottarabhāvikāryāpekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaniyataprākkālavartitvaparyavasāyi bhinnabhinnameva tatra praviṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4549: atra tu eka evobhayasamavetaḥ saṃyoga iti vyavasthādurghaṭetyarthaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4575: tadāśraya ātmeti na bodhamātramātmeti sāmpratamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4576: nanvevamātmano bodhasvarūpatvavadbodhasvabhāvatvamapi na saṃbhavati anityasya bodhasya nityātmasvabhāvatvāyogāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4577: arthiprakāśakādācitkatvāya bodhakādācitkatāyā eva mantavyatvāditi śaṅkate nanvevam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4578: jñānasya kriyātvamāgantukatvaṃ ca sādhayituṃ sāmānyavyāptiṃ śikṣayati arthāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4582: ubhayaniṣṭho 'pyayaṃ puruṣapravṛttimūlatvena puruṣāsādhāraṇaḥ puruṣaniṣṭhāgantukagamanakriyājanyo dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4590: kulaparamparayā prāpte kṣetrādau janmata eva svatvaṃ yasya bhāgino 'nyasyābhāvāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4592: tatra tadasādhāraṇer'thāntarakṣetrādisvatve tanniṣṭhakriyājanyatvaṃ nāstīti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4593: abhāvaprāptetyatra bhāvaprāpteti svabhāvaprāpteti vānyathā vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4594: anyakriyayā daivena vā svakṣetre patitānāṃ bījānāṃ prarūḍhānāṃ svatve svāsādhāraṇe svīyāgantukakriyājanyatvaṃ nāstīti vyabhicāramapi pradarśayati kṣetriṇam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4597: tathā kṣetriṇaḥ sattva eva tannirūpitaṃ kṣetrādisvatvaṃ sidhyatīti tatra tata eva nirvyāpārasyāpi kṣetriṇo janakatvaṃ setsyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4599: kintu jīvanameva vyāpāra iti śaṅkate tajjīvanameve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4606: nāto vyabhicāra iti cettarhyarthāntaramityāha api caivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4612: jīvanasyāpyuttarottarakālasattālakṣaṇasya na kriyārūpatvamiti na tadvyāpārajanyatvamapi sādhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4617: asmadaniṣṭaṃ sādhayituṃ pravṛttasya bhavator'thāntareṇa nigrahaṇamevāsmākaṃ lābha iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4618: svabhāvaprāptakṣetrādisvatve vyabhicārādevāgantukadharmajanyatvamapi na sādhayituṃ śakyata iti cānusandheyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4620: prakārāntareṇa ca tatsādhanaṃ dūṣayitumanuvadati na ca hetubhede ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4627: viśiṣṭe vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṅkāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena viśiṣṭe kālāvacchedapratītirviśeṣaṇe paryavasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4630: tathā ca yadrūpāvacchinnasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ tasyānityatvameva svarūpamātrasya ca na kālāvacchedapratītiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4631: svarūpamātrasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ pakṣe 'pyasiddheti pariharati ihāpī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4633: avacchinattikālāvacchinnatvaṃ yathā bhavettathā svasaṃbandhena viśinaṣṭi caitanyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4638: jñāne tasyaupādhikatvaniścaya ekāntataḥ kuta iti punaḥ śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4646: tenātmanaḥ svarūpata eva prakāśamānasya svāpe jñānavattvenāprakāśe 'pi na kṣatiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4650: ahaṃ dviṣyāmītyātmanaḥ sākṣātkāre jñānavattvenāprakāśādasiddhatvaṃ hetoriti vācyam;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4653: icchādipratyakṣakāle jñānasya svayaṃprakāśatvādicchādyanubhavavattvenāpyātmano bhānācca jñānavattvenaivātmana upalambhaḥ setsyatīti cānusandheyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4670: yogipratyakṣe ātmacintane ca dehaṃ vinā'tmabhānamuktvā laukikapratyakṣe 'pi tadāha jānāmī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4674: mano yathānuvartate na tathā śarīramekamiti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4677: tasya ca nātmasvabhāvatvamiti tatra vyabhicāra iti mandāśaṅkāmapanudati liṅgasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4678: apinānuvṛttireva nāsti pralaye mokṣe ceti vyajyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4683: ato viśiṣṭaviśeṣeṇānityatvaṃ svarūpato nityatvaṃ ca vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyātreti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4684: atha nityatve jñānasya caturdhā'kṣepamupakṣipya pratikṣipati bodhasvābhāvya ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4685: jñānasvabhāvatve puṃsaḥ svāpamūrcchayoḥ svarūpaprakāśaḥ syāditi prathamākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4687: jñānātiriktasya jñānajanyasya prakāśasya sattve 'pi ātmani bodhena tasyājananaṃ svāpe tamoguṇapratibandhādgāḍhāndhakārapratibandhādiva cākṣuṣasyājananamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4690: bodhasya sattve svāpa ātmano vyavahāraprasaṅga iti dvitīyākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4694: ādyo na sambhavatītyāha kaḥ khalvi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4701: tatsattve 'pi na tadviṣayasya vyāharaṇaṃ dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4702: tathāca svaviṣayavyāhāravyāptirjñānasya nāstītyasthāne prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4703: anubhave sati svāpa ātmano jāgaraṇe smṛtiprasaṅga iti tṛtīyākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4716: na tu jñānasya vṛttaya iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4722: yadvā bodha eva svo bhāvaḥ svarūpam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4723: tattvāccidrūpatvādevāsya-ātmanaḥ svaviṣayakasaṃskārajanakatvaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4729: nityabodhasvarūpasya saṃskārajanakatvedoṣamuktvā niṣprayojanatvamapyāha anubhave ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4731: nityānubhava eva jāgrati kaḥ saṃskārakalpanāyā artha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4737: ātmasvarūpamātrasya sadā prakāśe 'pi tattatkālādyavacchinnasya vṛttigrāhyatayā vṛtteśca saṃskārajanakatayā nirukta pratyaya upapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4739: nityātmabodhasya saṃskārajanakatve bādhakaṃ prayojanābhāvaṃ cābhidhāya tasya svāpādikālikasya saṃskārajanakatvāsaṃbhavamapyabhidhatte aviśadaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4745: atredaṃ bodhyam- yadyapi suptotthitasya sukhamahamasvāpsa mityādipratisandhānabalātsvāpakālikātmasvarūpānubhavasyāpi saṃskārajanakatvameṣṭavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4747: ata evāgre astu vā ityādinā pakṣāntaraṃ vakṣyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4748: anubhave vartamāne tāvanmātraviṣayakasmṛterudayāyoge 'pi pratyavamarśasyādhikaviṣayasya saṃskārabalādudaye na kṣatiriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4754: yathā jāgare sadānubhūyamānasyāpi karacaraṇādilakṣaṇasya śarīrasyāgantukaviśeṣasphuraṇavelāyāmeva viśeṣataḥ pratipattyānyadānanubhūyamānateva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4755: yathā vā'ntarasya jāgaraṇe śarīradhāraṇaprayatnasya sadānuvartamānasyāpi buddhipūrvahastādyutkṣepaṇakāla eva sphuṭāvabhāsenānyadānanubhūyamānateva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4764: svāpe 'pi bodhānuvṛttau samādhimuktayoḥ svāpāviśeṣaprasaṅga ityākṣepāntaramanūdya pariharati na cāvikṛte ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4772: samādhau ca puṃsaḥ paramavairāgyanirodhasaṃskārapāṭavātmaikapravaṇamanaskatvaprayuktamokṣopāyasiddhikṛtaḥ svāpato mahān viśeṣo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4781: atha svāpe 'pi anutyayā vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ setsyati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4782: kṛtaṃ svaprakāśatvenetyantarnidhāya svāpe 'pi buddhivṛttireṣṭavyeti śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4788: svāpe tama anubhave satyeva tajjasaṃskārataḥ prabodhe sukhamasvāpsamityādipratisandhānasyopapattiḥ nānyatheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4803: nidrāyā vṛttirūpatvābhāve pātañjalasūtrasya kā gatiriti śaṅkate kathaṃ tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4808: anyathākhyāterabhāvena bhedāgrahasyaiva bhramasthalābhiṣiktasya viparyayaśabditasya niroddhavyatvatātparyeṇa vṛttitvavannidrāyā api vṛttitvaṃ kīrtyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4814: sukhamahamasvāpsamiti pratīteḥ pratisandhānarūpatvamupagamyāpyāha astu ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4816: niruktarītyā svāpe 'pi bodhānuvṛttipratipādanācca tadeva pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4817: yatti hṛdayaṃ vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśo na svarūpata iti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4818: tattvāśāmodakāyitamiti ca pūrvottarābhyāṃ sunirūpitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4822: uparatāni hi prasvāpakāle sarvāṇyevendriyāṇi saha manasā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4826: kḷptaśca sarvārthasādhanatayā bodha iti tenaiva karaṇavirahiṇā satā svabhāvabhūteno(dbhūteno)
GSP33yaatsi_u:4831: vṛtteḥ karaṇajanyatvāditi parasya śaṅkāmanuvadati āhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4835: svāpe kāraṇāyogātsvataḥsiddha eva tamaḥprakāśako bodha ityeṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //27//
GSP33yaatsi_u:4840: iti balādeṣṭavyaṃ yadi tamo 'nubhavaḥ svāpa iṣyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4843: svarūpānubhavabalātsukhatvena tadā bhāsamānasyātmanaḥ parāmarśaḥ paraṃ prabodha iti tu siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4845: nityānubhavasya saṃskārājanakatve tu sākṣādeva svāpakālīnātmasvarūpānubhavasya niruktapratisandhānahetutvaṃ sukhatvenātmāgāhanāṃśa iti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4846: bodhasvabhāvasyāpyātmano vṛttikāla evāstu prakāśo na sarvadetyatra tāvannityaprakāśatvaṃ sādhayati nityaprakāśaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4858: tato hetvabhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptimupadarśayituṃ nidarśanatayā ghaṭādyupādātavyam-yadanityaprakāśamanyādhīnaprakāśaṃ vā tadapramātṛ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4860: tatra ca viśeṣaniṣedhasya sāmānyābhyanujñākṣepakatvādāgantukaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭādāvanumatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4861: atha tanmābhūditi viṣayaviṣayibhāva eva saṃbandhaḥ saṃgīyeta,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4865: acetanagocara eva tathā niyama iti cenna,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4867: na cānātmagocara eva sādhanasāpekṣatvaniyama iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4880: sa ca yathoditasādhanabalādeva sāṃsiddhiko nityaścātmana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4885: jñeyasya jñātuḥ svātmanaśca vyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānamudayata iti yuktaḥ triṣvapi ekarūpaḥ prakāśatevyavahāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4886: tattvāntaraprakāśābhyupagametātsvābhāvye jhr na ṭa ca punaḥ kiṃ caitanyāśrayaṇena? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4887: na ca prakāśa eva taditi vācyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4893: atha saṃvidastatsaṃbandhādhīnaḥ sa dharma iti cet;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4903: tayā cānumeyaṃ jñānamiti pakṣaḥ prāgeva pratikṣiptaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4905: ātmani samavetaṃ jñānamasaṃbandhinyarthe prakāśaṃ vyavahāraṃ vā kathaṃ prasuvītetyapi cintyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4907: na khalu labdhātmakaṃ kāryaṃ svanimittakāraṇamanurudhya kāryamārabhate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4911: ata indriyeṇa saha caitanyamapi nissṛtya tena tenārthena sannikṛṣyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4913: tathā sati hi tadupādhikatvāttajjñānasya yuktaṃ tadbhāvānuvidhāyitvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4919: nanu nityaprakāśatvaṃ svābhāvikabodhakṛtameva kiṃ na syādityatrāha svataḥsiddhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4923: jñānasya prakāśo jñānāntarānapekṣo 'pyātmasambandhāpekṣa iti jñāne 'nanyādhīnaprakāśatvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ nāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4924: tena sapakṣe jñāne sati pakṣamātravṛtti jñātṛtvaṃ bhavatyasādhāraṇamiti śaṅkānavakāśaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4930: atha prasaṅgāt prakāśa padārthaṃ nirṇetuṃ vimarśamupakṣipati kaḥ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4938: na caivaṃ sati tatra hetvabhāvo 'jñātṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4940: prakāśāśrayatvamātrasya tu sādhanāyogaḥ siddhatvāditi ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4941: uktadoṣaparihārāya prakārāntaraṃ śaṅkate atha tanmābhū diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4954: svātmabhinnaviṣaya eva viṣayīkārasya karaṇāpekṣatvamucyata iti na ca vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4956: svātmaprakāśane 'pi śabdaliṅgādikaraṇasāpekṣatvadarśanāt niyamasaṅkoco na karaṇīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4958: asya cātmaviṣayīkaraṇe na karaṇāpekṣetyatrāha viruddhe iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4960: svarūpamātrajñāne ākārabhedādavirodhasamarthanamapi na sambhavatītyāha nityatve tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4961: nanu svarūpasyaiva gamyatvepi tasyaiva gamakatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣadharmabhedāddhaṭetetyatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:4965: evaṃ grāhyagrāhakatāvacchedakadharmabhede pakṣīkṛtasyāpi ātmano na svaprakāśatvaṃ sidhyedityarthaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4970: prakāśata iti pratītivyavahārau ca prākaṭyāśrayatvārthakāveva prācuryeṇa pravartete /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4972: sa eva nityaḥ svābhāvikaścātmanaḥ sādhyatāṃ jñātṛtvabalāditi śaṅkāgranthārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4974: jñātatāvyavahārasya svaprakāśajñānata evopapatterna jñānajanye jñātatākhye dharmāntare pramāṇaṃ kimapīti parākaraṇaprakāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4977: tadadhīnavyavahārānuguṇyaṃ sambandhaḥ prakāśata ityatrākhyātārtha iti pakṣa eva jñeyajñānajñātṛṣu ekārthakatā prakāśatevyavahārasya ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4979: jñānātiriktasya prakāśasya nityasyātmanyupagame tatra jñānaṃ vyarthamiti cāha tattvāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4980: svaviṣayakajñāne satyevātmanaḥ prakāśamānateti kṣemasādhāraṇaprayojakatopagamānnātmani caitanyasya vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkate yadyucyete ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4984: tathā ca caitanyasamavāyitvasya prakāśamānatāprayojakatve caitanye tadabhāvātprakāśamānatā na ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4985: nanu caitanyasambandha eva prakāśaheturupeyata iti cettatrāha kastaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4997: jñānasya tvatīndriyasya jñātatāliṅgakānumānātprākaṭyaṃ sambhavati prakāśatevyavahāranidānamityatrāha jñānādhīne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5002: cātmani prakāśatevyavahāra iti triṣvapi tasyaikarūpyāsambhava etanmata iti sthitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5003_1: procya gurumate 'pi triṣu vyavahārānuguṇye aikarūpyāsambhavaṃ vimarśaka udbhāvayati svaprakāśe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5006: jñānāśrayatayā cātmani vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vaktavyamiti gurumate 'pi vairūpyamaśakyaparihāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5010: tat tasminnarthe prakaṭatāṃ vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vā niṣpādayatīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5016: jñānasyaiva svakāryaniṣpādane svanimittāpekṣetyāśrayaṇe cedamapi vaiṣamyaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5019: anyatra nimittanāśe kāryanāśasyādarśanāt jñānasyaiva nimittanāśena nāśābhyupagamenāpi vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5020: kaṃ tarhi prakāśasya vyavahārasya vopapattiḥ? tatrāti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5021: iti indriyādidvārā prasṛtasya tena sahārthasannikṛṣṭasya jñānasyārthaprakāśakasyārthapkāvyavahāra- janakatvaṃ svīkāryamanāyatyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5024: indriyeṇa saha pravṛttyādimattve hi jñānasya tadarthasannikṛṣṭasya tatprakāśakasyendriyārthasannikarṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyanvayavyat irekopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5041: paṭa eka iti sarvadravyasādhāraṇyamekatvasya na syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5042: nahi ghaṭasvarūpasya paṭasvarūpeṇa saṃbhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5046: tathā prakṛte 'pi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkate na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5048: apekṣābuddhināśena dvitvādināśasyāsiddhatvena na nimittanāśena kāryanāśe dvitvādernāśasya nidarśanatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5054: dṛṣṭānte hetvāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate nanu naikatvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5071: dṛṣṭānte hetvasiddhiṃ śaṅkate ' nanu naikatva 'm iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5079: svarūpatve bādhakamuktvaikatvasya saṅkhyātve sādhakamapyāha ' saṅkhyakate ' ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5082: atredaṃ bodhyam-uddeśyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaparyāpterdvitvādisaṃbandhatayā bhānāt ekatvāvacchinnaparyāpteśca dvitvādisaṃbandhatvābhāvena na ekaṃ dvāviti prayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5091: anyacca, arthasya prakāśakaṃ hi jñānaṃ bhavatām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5092: sarvaṃ ca prakāśakaṃ prakāśyavastusannikṛṣṭameva prakāśakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dīpaprabhādi /

GSP33yaatsi_u:5664: ataḥ svāśrayāśrayatvasaṃbandhena jñānavattvameva jñātṛtvamatra pakṣe vācyamiti viṣaye na jñātṛtvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5669: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-arthagrahaṇārthaṃ vyāpriyamāṇaṃ hi caitanyameva / tathāca
GSP33yaatsi_u:5670: viṣayacaitanyasaṃyogasya tattadarthajñānatve 'pi tasya svānukūlavyāpṛtimaccaitanyāśrayatvasaṃbandhenātmanyeva sattvāttasyaiva jñātṛtvaṃ nārthāderityupalambhabalādvyavasthāpyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:5671: yathā ālokārthasaṃyogasyaiva prakāśatve 'pi prakāśakatvaṃ svadharmabhūtālokaprasaraṇavaśātsūryādereva nārthasya tadvaditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5674: evaṃ prathamaṃ pakṣamupapādya tattadarthasaṃbaddhaṃ caitanyameva tattadarthajñānamiti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ śaṅkāsamādhānamukhena vyavasthāpayati atheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5677: tattadarthasaṃbaddhālokāśrayasyaiva sūryādeḥ prakāśakatvamiva tattadarthasaṃbaddhacaitanyavata ātmana eva jñātṛtvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5680: ananyasādhana ityuktamananyādhīnasiddhitvaṃ caitanyasvabhāvatvaṃ cātmano nigamayati tatsiddhamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5695: anumānāgamānāṃ parokṣaikahetutvena prasphuṭaprakāśāsampādakatvāttāvanmātre 'paritoṣaḥ prasphuṭātmaprakāśākāṅkṣiṇāṃ yukta eva hi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5696: mana ādigatajñānāvāraṇadoṣakṣapaṇaṃ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānena sampadyata iti yamaniyameti dyotitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5710: tatra sugatamatānusāriṇaḥ sanmātrānubandhinīṃ kṣaṇikatāmācakṣāṇā nityātmadarśanameva sarvānarthamūlaṃ manyamānāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginamenaṃ saṅgirante;
GSP33yaatsi_u:5717: na tasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃbhāvyata ityarthakriyākāritaiva sattā bhāvānām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5718: na ca sā svavyāpakabhūtakramayaugapadyavirahiṇyakṣaṇike saṃbhavinītyanyatra niravakāśatayā kṣaṇikatayaivānubadhyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5722: svaprakāśasyātmano dharmabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayādigrahaṇe dehādivailakṣaṇyagrahaṇe cātmana upayujyata ityetāvatā siddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5729: ātmanaḥ kālasaṃbandhe vicāraviṣaye kṣaṇamātrakālasaṃbandhinaṃ vināśinamātmānamāmananti kecana vādinaḥ (saugatāḥ) iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5740: taccākṣaṇike sthire 'ghaṭamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ kṣaṇike vyavaśtāpayatīti sattva kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamevetyāpatatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5746: bhāvābhāvavadanayoranyataranivṛttāvanyataravyavasthānādarthakriyājanane bhāvānāṃ na tṛtīyaprakārasaṃbhava iti kramākramapratibaddhaivārthakriyā / na cākṣa
GSP33yaatsi_u:5754: tadabhāve ca yaugapadyaṃ niyatamiti kramayaugapadyānyataravyāpyaivārthakriyā bhavatītyarthaḥ //44/
